SELECT b.user_nickname,c.information_compellation,g.grade_name, g.grade_describe,g.grade_nickname,g.grade_introduce,g.upgrade_order,u.weixin_nickname, u.weixin_follow_data_yes as user_register_data, c.information_card,c.information_phone,c.information_sex,c.co_founder, c.co_user_basics_id,ui.user_basics_id as user_basics_id2, ui.information_compellation as information_compellation2, uw.weixin_nickname as weixin_nickname2,uin.information_compellation as information_compellation3, c.user_resources FROM user_grade g RIGHT JOIN user_basics b ON (g.user_grade_id = b.user_grade_id) LEFT JOIN user_information c ON (c.user_basics_id = b.user_basics_id) left join user_weixin u on b.user_basics_id=u.user_basics_id left join user_recommend ur on ur.user_basics_id=b.user_basics_id left join user_information ui on ui.user_basics_id=ur.recommend_superior left join user_weixin uw on uw.user_basics_id=ur.recommend_superior left join user_information uin on uin.user_basics_id=ui.co_user_basics_id WHERE 1=1 and c.user_basics_id = #{user_basics_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
